verbs.description: [ARG1: pigs] [V: rescued] [ARG2: from a fire] were later served as sausages to thank the firefighters the 18 piglets and two sows were rescued after an electrical fault set hay on fire at a farm in milton lilbourne 70 miles west of london in february southwest england milton lilbourne rachel rivers
